name: Stuffie Team Six
description:
Play as a stuffed animal sent to a war zone to comfort sad children.

Use your cuteness to give reassuring hugs.

But watch out for the bad guys.

Grab a gun and protect the children.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Throw gun
  • E - Hug
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Roll
  • Esc - Quit

Created by: Nic Lupfer in ~48 hours for the Chillennium Game Jam at TAMU

Tools: Unity, Blender, Visual Studio, Photoshop, Sfxr, Audacity
